Name: ManagedNumericRepresentationName
Description: A name for the ManagedNumericRepresentation. May be expressed in multiple languages. Repeat the element to express names with different content, for example different names for different systems.

Name: Label
Description: A display label for the ManagedNumericRepresentation. Supports multiple language versions of the same content as well as optional formatting of the content. Repeat for labels with different content, for example, labels with differing length limitations.

Name: Description
Description: A description of the content and purpose of the ManagedNumericRepresentation. Supports multiple language versions of the same content as well as optional formatting of the content.

Name: RecommendedDataType
Description: This field provides the recommended treatment of the data within an application. The value should come from a controlled vocabulary - recommended values include the set found in W3C XML Schema Part 2, but excluding string sub-types, QNAME, and NOTATION. The DDI Alliance has provided a controlled vocabulary (DataType) to support this element at http://www.ddialliance.org/controlled-vocabularies.

Name: GenericOutputFormat
Description: This field provides a recommended generic treatment of the data for display by an application. The value should come from a controlled vocabulary.

Name: NumberRange
Description: Defines the valid number range or number values for the representation.

Name: NumericTypeCode
Description: Identification of the numeric type such as integer, decimal, etc. supports the use of an external controlled vocabulary. The DDI Alliance has provided a controlled vocabulary (NumericType) to support this element at http://www.ddialliance.org/controlled-vocabularies.

Name: Format
Description: A format for number expressed as a string.

Name: Scale
Description: The scale of the number expressed as an integer (for example a number expressed in 100's, 5 = 500 would have a scale of 100).

Name: DecimalPositions
Description: The number of decimal positions expressed as an integer (precision of the number).

Name: Interval_IntervalType
Description: The interval between valid responses expressed as an integer.

Name: ClassificationLevel
Description: Indicates the type of relationship, nominal, ordinal, interval, ratio, or continuous. Use where appropriate for the representation type.

Name: Accuracy
Description: The level to which a number is considered to be accurate. Expressed as a decimal.
